welcome_message_body: Welcome to Bottrop, Germany! This charming city is known for its beautiful parks, cultural attractions, and friendly locals. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that Bottrop has to offer during your visit.

restaurants.name: Daikychi Sushibar

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Essen Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Essen Airport, mainly used for low-cost carriers and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport, but may require a login or registration.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: A smaller terminal for low-cost and regional flights.

terminals.name: Terminal C
terminals.description: A modern terminal for long-haul and international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
